name: New Untitled AIConfig

prompts.name: prompt_1
prompts.input: write a haiku about a cat

outputs.data:
Gentle whiskers twitch
Paws padding softly, she purrs
Content in slumber

prompts.name: prompt_2
prompts.input: Write a haiku about {{animal}} living in {{location}}

outputs.data:
In Boston's brisk air,
Llama in her red scarf roams,
City life she wears.

raw_response.content:
In Boston's brisk air,
Llama in her red scarf roams,
City life she wears.
